overview: Historical documentary of the devastating path of hurricane Mitch by this Central American country. Includes general information about Honduras, its history, and the development process delay, partly because of the serious damage caused by natural disasters such as Hurricanes Fifí in 1974 and Mitch in 1998.

production_companies.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión de San Antonio de los Baños

title: Más allá de una esperanza
